name: Super Word Chain
description:
How to play:

  • Flip enemies over by jumping under them.
  • Collect letters from flipped enemies to create words.

Controls:

  • Left - Left arrow key/A key
  • Right - Right arrow key/D key
  • Jump - Up arrow key/Space bar/W key

#ChainLetterJam

If nominated, you have two weeks to make a 1 minute game in some way inspired by the game that nominated you.

Once finished, put #ChainLetterJam in your game description, a link to the game that nominated you, and then nominate two other devs (or less or more, whatever, this isn't a chain letter where you die in three days if you don't).

I was nominated from Road Snake by Mr. Moo

Who was nominated by TheShelfman<-GamesBySaul<-WannibeManisha<-Yannick<-Zyger<-Vimlark<-Miziziziz

Each of which are a playable character in this game!

Now I've finished, I nominate Neat Games & PhilDev to continue on the chain.
